Question
========

Within one standard deviation of the mean lies x% of the observations and within two standard deviations of the mean lies y% . We know that this variable has a normal distribution. What then is x and y?

Answerlist
----------

* X = 0.5, y = 1
* X = 1, y = 2
* X = 68, y = 95
* X = 95, y = 68

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* X = 0.5, y = 1: Incorrect
* X = 1, y = 2: Incorrect
* X = 68, y = 95: Correct
* X = 95, y = 68: Incorrect
